description: A file for researching bugs, which you're probably doing if you can see this.

A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, bits of pressed leaves and flowers, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the natural world.

A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, polished rocks and samples of soil, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the earth.
A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, astrological observations, and other esoterica for research into magic.  Using this, you might be able to discover a magical formula related to the sky.
